caption.p: (A) Kinetics of hydrolysis of Chinese star anise whole seedpod, corn, sunflower and olive oils emulsions by pancreatic lipase. (B) Kinetics of hydrolysis of CSAO emulsion by Novozyme® 435 and pancreatic lipase. Novozyme® 435-mediated hydrolysis kinetics of olive oil were recorded as a control experiment. The enzyme amount is equivalent to 10 units on olive oil emulsion in each case.
